name: Synthra
description: Synthra is a decentralized exchange built to serve emerging and under–explored EVM chains. The platform offers efficient token swaps with low fees and a sustainable revenue model that supports its continuous growth. By focusing on “exotic” EVM ecosystems, Synthra provides reliable infrastructure and liquidity where traditional DEXes are often absent. The long–term goal of Synthra is to expand across multiple EVM networks, becoming the primary liquidity hub in these ecosystems while building a strong community of users, developers and liquidity providers.
